price: 55. Certains d’entre eux ont cru en lui (Muhammad), d’autres se sont détournés de lui. Il leur suffira de brûler dans la Géhenne incandescente.
arabic: فَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ ءَامَنَ بِهِۦ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن صَدَّ عَنۡهُۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِجَهَنَّمَ سَعِيرًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: famin'hum man āmana bihi wamin'hum man ṣadda ʿanhu wakafā bijahannama saʿīran
